subject: PROJECT LIGHTHOUSE: Documentation Complete
content:
MISSION ACCOMPLISHED: I have planted README flags in all critical sectors (src, dashboard, docker, legacy, Knowledge). 

WHY:
1. Zero-Context Onboarding: Agents can now land anywhere and understand the local laws.
2. Safety: The Legacy Graveyard is clearly marked.
3. Navigation: DOC_INDEX.md is the updated master map.

The system is no longer a maze; it is a well-lit factory.
